content.question: Of the following, the most threatening problem for the Union from 1861 through 1863 was

choices.label: possible British recognition of the Confederacy
French objections to the Union blockade
British insistence on the abolition of slavery
British objections to the Union position on “continuous voyage”

content.answer: possible British recognition of the Confederacy

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
